alfredsnippet.snippet:
"We can now set our entire solar system in a grand, evolving scenario stretching back to a Big Bang -- an era when everything was hotter than the centers of stars and expanding on a timescale of a few seconds. The evidence is as compelling as most of the claims made by geologists and paleontologists about the history of Earth -- indeed, it is a lot more quantitative."

- Martin Rees, Our Cosmic Habitat (2001) p.124
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Martin Rees Equates Quantitative with Compelling
